title: Which kpop groups write their own songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s a lot of kpop groups out there that write their own songs but i will put a short list (this based on what i know , there probably have more of it that i might dont know or forgot to mention here .) My answer will be pretty offensive but the truth is i didnt hate anybody here . Just want fix the misinformation and to state the facts . BTS aint the 1st group that write their own songs . And not 3rd generation of kpop overall that started this but 2nd generation . They just followed the path . Let me drop by the answer cuz the facts is not everyone know the truth . People tend to blindly write down the statement without make a proper check . Here the groups that write their own songs : BIGBANG Was the 1st ever group in the history that write , compose & produce their own songs in kpop industry through their song LIES ( if i didnt mistaken and correct me if i was wrong ) They’re the one that started this “write , composing & producing” culture (and still write , compose and produce their own songs till today) before it become a trend and followed by others groups .GD is the main producer , singer-songwriter that took the responsibility to write , compose and produce the songs for his group and also the person that help to write the songs for his group members and also to other artists as well . BLOCK B Zico was the main producer , composer & songwriter of the group . Not only that , he also writes a songs for a lot of other artists . WINNER They write and compose almost all of the songs for their album and for each comeback .Seungyoon and Seunghoon are the person that took the responsibility to write and compose the song for the group . iKON Hanbin is the main producer , song-writer and also the composer of the group . He is in charged in writes , compose and producing all of the songs for his group , take part in create a chroes and also write the songs for other artists as well . SEVENTEEN Woozi is the main producer of the group . He is also in charged in write and compose the songs for other artists . PENTAGON Hui is the main producer and songwriter . Take part in writes a song for other artists as well . STRAY KIDS Bang Chan , Changbin and Han are the main producer and song writer of the group .Most of their songs had been written by the mmbers itself . All of them have the ability to write their own lyrics . (In other hands , stan Stray Kids ) EXID L.E is the main producer and song writer of the group . She’s also write songs for other artists as well . (G)-IDLE Soyeon is the main producer and song writer of the group . MONSTA X Jooheon & I.M are participating in writing & compose most of their b-side track . DAY6 Most of the members are participating in writes and compose a songs . AB6IX Daehwi is the main producer , song writer , composer of the group while most of the members are participating in writing a lyrics .Daehwi also compose and writes a song for other artists such as a final song for finalist of PRODUCE X 101 (Dream For You) ATEEZ Hongjoong is the main producer , composer and song writer of the group . So this is the list . They are very talented human being , such a great artists and performers . They serve such a best quality of music and songs . Please look forward for them ^^ Thank You ~

Ateez- Hongjoong writes most of the songs, also Mingi writes as well (rap line). BTS- Pretty much everybody knows that rap line created BTS discography Namjoon is usually lyricist while both Yoon gi and J-Hope produce songs their songs are about life, youth, the situation in SK...soical topic most of the time. iKon-B.I write songs and he does it pretty damn good job. NCT- Taeyong and Mark write. The interesting topic just reread lyric of whiplash and then go to yestoday-it's actually unbelievable that Taeyong wrote both of these songs. I heard that Xiao Jun is a talented songwriter so I am looking forward to seeing his skills in WayV Seventeen- they are known as a self-producing band since not only they write their songs (Woozi, leader of the vocal unit most of the time) but they often choreograph themselves. Hip Hop unit is very talented I have to say Trauma is a masterpiece. Stray Kids-3RACHA (Chris, Changbin, and Jisung)writes everything. Their topics are same as BTS so not about romance rather about youth and their society very talented songwriters. Day6- Brian wrote pretty much all their songs and he is let me telly ou freaking amazing. Side notes: Chanyeol from Exo is a very talented songwriter and sometimes writes their songs also Lay writes his own songs. JB, BamBam, and Jinyoung all wrote songs for Got7 notable is their title track You Are written by JB There is probably more but I made a list of people I had on my mind right now.
